title: Authors and Citation
text: Rob Hyndman. Author, maintainer, copyright holder. RStudio. Copyright holder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Hyndman R (2023). fpp2: Data "Forecasting: Principles Practice" (2nd Edition). https://pkg.robjhyndman.com/fpp2-package/, https://github.com/robjhyndman/fpp2-package, https://otexts.com/fpp2/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {fpp2: Data for "Forecasting: Principles and Practice" (2nd Edition)},   author = {Rob Hyndman},   year = {2023},   note = {https://pkg.robjhyndman.com/fpp2-package/, https://github.com/robjhyndman/fpp2-package, https://otexts.com/fpp2/}, }

title: Data for
text: R package fpp2 loads data required examples exercises used book Forecasting: Principles Practice (2nd edition) Rob J Hyndman George Athanasopoulos. also loads several packages needed analysis described book.

title: Data for
text: can install stable version CRAN. can install development version Github

title: Data for
text: library(fpp2) load following packages: forecast, forecasting methods data sets. ggplot2, data visualisation. fma, data taken book “Forecasting: methods applications” Makridakis, Wheelwright Hyndman (1998). expsmooth, data taken book “Forecasting Exponential Smoothing” Hyndman, Koehler, Ord Snyder (2008). also get condensed summary conflicts packages loaded:
code: library(fpp2) #> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'quantmod': #>   method            from #>   as.zoo.data.frame zoo #> ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────────────────── fpp2 2.5 ── #> ✔ ggplot2   3.4.0     ✔ fma       2.5   #> ✔ forecast  8.20      ✔ expsmooth 2.4 #>

text: elecdemand half-hourly time series matrix three columns: elecdaily daily time series matrix three columns:

title: Half-hourly and daily electricity demand for Victoria, Australia, in 2014 — elecdemand
Half-hourly and daily electricity demand for Victoria, Australia, in 2014 — elecdemand
text: Australian Energy Market Operator, Australian Bureau Meteorology.

title: Half-hourly and daily electricity demand for Victoria, Australia, in 2014 — elecdemand
text: data operational demand, demand met local scheduled generating units, semi-scheduled generating units, non-scheduled intermittent generating units aggregate capacity larger 30 MW, generation imports region. operational demand excludes demand met non-scheduled non-intermittent generating units, non-scheduled intermittent generating units aggregate capacity smaller 30 MW, exempt generation (e.g. rooftop solar, gas tri-generation, small wind farms, etc), demand local scheduled loads. also excludes large industrial users (mines smelters).

title: Half-hourly and daily electricity demand for Victoria, Australia, in 2014 — elecdemand
code: summary(elecdemand) #>      Demand         WorkDay        Temperature    #>  Min.   :2.858   Min.   :0.0000   Min.   : 1.50   #>  1st Qu.:3.927   1st Qu.:0.0000   1st Qu.:12.60   #>  Median :4.596   Median :1.0000   Median :15.80   #>  Mean   :4.610   Mean   :0.6877   Mean   :16.51   #>  3rd Qu.:5.159   3rd Qu.:1.0000   3rd Qu.:19.40   #>  Max.   :9.345   Max.   :1.0000   Max.   :43.20   summary(elecdaily) #>      Demand         WorkDay        Temperature    #>  Min.   :166.7   Min.   :0.0000   Min.   : 9.80   #>  1st Qu.:205.4   1st Qu.:0.0000   1st Qu.:16.60   #>  Median :221.0   Median :1.0000   Median :20.30   #>  Mean   :221.3   Mean   :0.6877   Mean   :21.26   #>  3rd Qu.:236.7   3rd Qu.:1.0000   3rd Qu.:24.30   #>  Max.   :347.6   Max.   :1.0000   Max.   :43.20

Annual average sunspot area (1875-2015) — sunspotarea
text: Annual averages daily sunspot areas (units millionths hemisphere) full sun. Sunspots magnetic regions appear dark spots surface sun. Royal Greenwich Observatory compiled daily sunspot observations May 1874 1976. Later data US Air Force US National Oceanic Atmospheric Administration. data calibrated consistent across whole history observations.

title: Annual average sunspot area (1875-2015) — sunspotarea

fpp2 2.5
fpp2 2.4
text: CRAN release: 2020-09-09 Updated data descriptions a10, h02, calls. Fixed day week elecdaily data Moved packages depends imports Added start message conflicts warnings

title: fpp2 2.3
text: CRAN release: 2018-04-13 Changed scale visnights gasoline Added packages Suggests examples Now depends forecast v8.3+

title: fpp2 2.2
text: CRAN release: 2018-02-20 Added raw data package Added elecdaily Added visnights Added goog200 Added prison prisonLF Updated available data Corrected documentation

title: fpp2 2.1
text: CRAN release: 2017-05-26 Switched roxygen Fixed documentation Fixed data dimension errors Restricted uschange data 1970+

title: fpp2 2.0
text: CRAN release: 2017-02-23 Updated 2nd edition book Updated data available Corrected help files Added new data

title: fpp2 0.5 (14 March 2013)
text: added vn, debitcards, departures cafe data sets. missing value removed end usmelec.

title: fpp2 0.4 (30 April 2012)
fpp2 0.3 (26 March 2012)
fpp2 0.2 (22 February 2012)
text: data added Changed description now mentions book rather workshop.

title: fpp2 0.1 (4 June 2011)
text: Started adding data files FPP workshop.
